Team

LaTeX is based on Donald E. Knuth’s TeX typesetting language or certain extensions. LaTeX was first developed in 1985 by Leslie Lamport, and is now being maintained and developed by the LaTeX3 Project.

People involved in the LaTeX3 project are (in more or less chronological order):

  • Frank Mittelbach LaTeX3 Team frank.mittelbach@latex-project.org https://github.com/FrankMittelbach http://tex.stackexchange.com/users/10109 http://www.linkedin.com/in/frankmittelbach
  • Rainer Schöpf LaTeX3 Team https://www.ctan.org/
  • Chris Rowley LaTeX3 Team
  • David Carlisle LaTeX3 Team http://www.dcarlisle.demon.co.uk/ https://github.com/davidcarlisle http://tex.stackexchange.com/users/1090
  • Johannes Braams LaTeX3 Team http://www.xs4all.nl/~jlbraams/
  • Robin Fairbairns LaTeX3 Team http://www.cl.cam.ac.uk/users/rf/
  • Morten Høgholm LaTeX3 Team
  • Javier Bezos LaTeX3 Team http://www.tex-tipografia.com/
  • Will Robertson LaTeX3 Team http://willwont.blogspot.com/ https://github.com/wspr
  • Joseph Wright LaTeX3 Team joseph.wright@morningstar2.co.uk josephawright http://www.texdev.net/ https://github.com/josephwright http://tex.stackexchange.com/users/73 https://uk.linkedin.com/in/joseph-wright-9302718a
  • Bruno Le Floch LaTeX3 Team blflatex@gmail.com https://github.com/blefloch
  • Jonas Jared Jacek Webmaster http://jonas.me/ https://github.com/jonasjacek/

Former Team Members

  • Denys Duchier
  • Michael Downes
  • Alan Jeffrey
  • Martin Schröder
